messages.content: Is the Moon made of cheese?
No, the Moon is not made of cheese. Although some cheeses are similar in flavor to limestone, the Moon does not contain any cheese as part of its core.

Yes, the Moon does not contain any cheese as part of its core. The core of the Moon is composed of an inner core and a solid outer core. The inner core is approximately the size of the United States at about 20 miles (32 km) across.
